title: Akkad Bakkad Rafu Chakkar
overview: The "good life" is just one scam away. This thought takes root in the minds of two friends Bhargav and Siddhant after they read countless news stories of bank scams that have happened in the country and that a total of seventy-one thousand five hundred crores has been scammed. Together they devise a plan to open India's first fake bank. Will they get away or will they get caught?
